tool_description: Get predictions for all international and domestic soccer tournaments, including World Cups, leagues, Champions League, and UEFA, among others. Our predictions are meticulously generated by utilizing multiple algorithms and applying specific filters.
name: Betting Tips API
title: Betting Tips API

api_list.name: Live Scores
api_list.description:
All world cups and leagues, Champions league and UEFA etc. Live match scores of all leagues, including:

 

Features :

Names and coats of arms of all countries and leagues,
Names and coats of arms of all teams,
Live score data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://betting-tips-api.p.rapidapi.com/livescores/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betting-tips-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Predictions
api_list.description: Endpoint for get all predictions , include Team and League names-logos, league country flags,  match dates, match results and all odds.
